page.title: 03WASTE DISPOSAL
page.content:
At{Cleanaway}there was{65}people working there.On the 2nd August 1985 all the{barges}will stop and only{25 jobs will be left.Jobs lost will be tug masters,barge hand,crane controllers.They started the dump when farmers from{London}came down with empty barges to cut hay.After a while people paid the{farmers}to take rubbish out of the city to a place where there was room to dump it.
{LIQUID WASTE Some liquid waste is dangerous and doesn't mix so they have to keep it seperate at{Cleanaway.}It arrives by tanker,it checks in at the{Gatehouse to see what type of liquid waste they have. They fill in lots of{Paperwork.} If dangerous liquids are being emptied a warden must go with the {Tanker}in case there is an
